name: Smiley's Colorful Adventure
description:
Help Smiley get home safely!

Development team:

Caleb Hall, Jasmine Chen, Jeffery Xue, Percy Simms

Team role:

Jasmine - Lead artist, and UI designer. Focused on the aesthetics of this project.

Percy - Creator of the story and character, Lead writer.

Jeffery - Lead programmer, as well as a knowledgeable base about unities functions.

Caleb - focused on the level design, and integration of the project.

Playtest note version 1:

From this playtest, we realized that we had to decide on a future direction for the game: would it be more playable or more like an experience-based drawing tool? If we decided to make the game more fun and provide a more complete experience, we would need to change the current plan and add some level design.
